PurposeText: This is IUDEX, an online programming judge. It is a platform designed to challenge and improve your programming skills through competitive programming. Thanks to this tool, users will be able to participate in contests and solve problems for educational purposes, with automatic correction. It can be used for evaluation in college courses or as a training tool. IUDEX has been created to facilitate the user experience and to provide a friendly interface, so users can be comfortable while using it.
HowWorksText1: Once you log in, you will see all the contests in which you are a participant. Just choose one of the contests, and then you will be able to look at the problems, make submissions and see the ranking of the contest. In your home screen, you will be able to see the results of your submissions and you can even access a code editor to solve the problems and make submissions faster! You can also change the app theme and the language in the footer.
HowWorksText2: If you have administrator or judge permissions, you will be able to create and edit contests, problems, and teams. Also, you will be able to see the details of each submission and the ranking of the contests.
UsefulInfoText: The supported languages at the moment are Python, Java, C and C++. You will be able to see the time and memory limits of each problem in the 'Problems' tab or in the corresponding PDF file.
